NAME: A
LABEL: 1a. Bzone Population growth
INSTRUCTIONS: Keep all three Azone households constant.  For Bzones, compute growth (2045-2019) households (bzone_dwelling_units.csv).  Move some household growth from east to west such that, at the Bzone level, the average percent difference from baseline values is 48%.

LEVELS.LABEL: High growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Higher household growth in selected bzones with average percent difference from baseline of 48%

NAME: B
LABEL: 1b. Bzone Employment growth
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase growth in employment so the target average percent difference at the Bzone level is 136%.

LEVELS.LABEL: High growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Higher employment growth in selected bzones with average percent difference from baseline of 136%

NAME: C
LABEL: 2a. Azone population growth
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase growth in Azone population by 10% and corresponding Bzone households by 10%.

NAME: D
LABEL: 2b. Azone employment growth
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase growth in employment by 12% (must do this for all Bzones uniformly).
